00042 #include <avr32/io.h>
00043 #include "conf_isp.h"
00044 
00045 
00048 
00049 
00050   // Performs efficiently a bitwise logical Exclusive-OR between the specified
00051   // register and an immediate value of up to 32 bits. The result is stored in
00052   // the destination register.
00053   .macro  eor.w   rd, imm
00054     .if \imm & 0x0000FFFF
00055       eorl    \rd, LO(\imm)
00056     .endif
00057     .if \imm & 0xFFFF0000
00058       eorh    \rd, HI(\imm)
00059     .endif
00060   .endm
00061 
00062   // Moves efficiently an immediate value of up to 32 bits into a register.
00063   .macro  mov.w   rd, imm
00064     .if \imm & 0xFFF00000
00065       mov     \rd, LO(\imm)
00066       orh     \rd, HI(\imm)
00067     .else
00068       mov     \rd, \imm
00069     .endif
00070   .endm
00071 
00072   // Performs efficiently a bitwise logical OR between the specified register
00073   // and an immediate value of up to 32 bits. The result is stored in the
00074   // destination register.
00075   .macro  or.w    rd, imm
00076     .if \imm & 0x0000FFFF
00077       orl     \rd, LO(\imm)
00078     .endif
00079     .if \imm & 0xFFFF0000
00080       orh     \rd, HI(\imm)
00081     .endif
00082   .endm
00083 
00084 
00085   .section  .reset, "ax", @progbits
00086 
00087 
00088   .balign 2
00089 
00090   // Reset vector: This must be linked @ 0x80000000.
00091   .global _start
00092   .type _start, @function
00093 _start:
00094 
00095   // Start of exception vector table: Unrecoverable exception.
00096   .global _evba
00097   .type _evba, @function
00098 _evba:
00099   mfsr    r8, AVR32_SR
00100   bfextu  r8, r8, AVR32_SR_M0_OFFSET, AVR32_SR_M0_SIZE + AVR32_SR_M1_SIZE + AVR32_SR_M2_SIZE
00101   cp.w    r8, 0b001
00102   breq    boot_supervisor_mode
00103   sub     r8, pc, $ - boot_supervisor_mode
00104   mov.w   r9, AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | AVR32_SR_M0_MASK
00105   mov     sp, _estack - 6 * 4
00106   pushm   r8-r9
00107   rete
00108 
00109 boot_supervisor_mode:
00110   mov     r8, ISP_KEY_ADDRESS
00111   mov     r9, AVR32_WDT_ADDRESS
00112   mov     r10, AVR32_FLASHC_ADDRESS
00113   mov     r11, AVR32_PM_ADDRESS
00114   ld.w    r0, r8[0]
00115   mov.w   r1, ISP_KEY_VALUE
00116   ld.w    r2, r10[AVR32_FLASHC_FGPFR]
00117   bld     r2, ISP_GPFB_BOD_EN_OFFSET
00118   brcc    test_isp_gpfb_force
00119   ld.w    r3, r11[AVR32_PM_BOD]
00120   mov.w   r4, AVR32_BOD_KEY << AVR32_PM_BOD_KEY_OFFSET
00121   or.w    r3, AVR32_PM_BOD_FCD_MASK |\
00122               ((~AVR32_BOD_KEY << AVR32_PM_BOD_KEY_OFFSET) & AVR32_PM_BOD_KEY_MASK)
00123   mov     r5, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_ENABLED_NORESET
00124   bfins   r3, r5, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_OFFSET, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_SIZE
00125   st.w    r11[AVR32_PM_BOD], r4
00126   st.w    r11[AVR32_PM_BOD], r3
00127   mov     r5, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_ENABLED
00128   bfins   r3, r5, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_OFFSET, AVR32_PM_BOD_CTRL_SIZE
00129   st.w    r11[AVR32_PM_BOD], r4
00130   st.w    r11[AVR32_PM_BOD], r3
00131 test_isp_gpfb_force:
00132   bld     r2, ISP_GPFB_FORCE_OFFSET
00133   brcs    start_loader
00134   ld.w    r3, r11[AVR32_PM_RCAUSE]
00135   mov.w   r4, AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_POR_MASK |\
00136               AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_EXT_MASK |\
00137               AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_JTAG_MASK |\
00138               AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_OCDRST_MASK |\
00139               AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_JTAGHARD_MASK
00140   tst     r3, r4
00141   brne    manage_io_cond
00142   bld     r3, AVR32_PM_RCAUSE_WDT_OFFSET
00143   brcs    start_program
00144   cp.w    r0, r1
00145   brne    start_program_no_isp_key
00146 
00147 start_loader:
00148   rcall   disable_wdt
00149   st.w    r8[0], r1
00150 
00151   // Set initial stack pointer.
00152   mov     sp, _estack
00153 
00154   // Disable the exception processing.
00155   ssrf    AVR32_SR_EM_OFFSET
00156 
00157   // Set up EVBA so interrupts can be enabled.
00158   sub     r0, pc, $ - _evba
00159   mtsr    AVR32_EVBA, r0
00160 
00161   // Load initialized data having a global lifetime from the data LMA.
00162   mov     r0, _data
00163   mov     r1, _edata
00164   sub     r2, pc, $ - _data_lma
00165   rjmp    test_load_idata_end
00166 load_idata:
00167   ld.d    r4, r2++
00168   st.d    r0++, r4
00169 test_load_idata_end:
00170   cp.w    r0, r1
00171   brlo    load_idata
00172 
00173   // Clear uninitialized data having a global lifetime in the blank static storage section.
00174   mov     r0, __bss_start
00175   mov     r1, _end
00176   mov     r2, 0
00177   mov     r3, 0
00178   rjmp    test_clear_udata_end
00179 clear_udata:
00180   st.d    r0++, r2
00181 test_clear_udata_end:
00182   cp.w    r0, r1
00183   brlo    clear_udata
00184 
00185   // Call the ISP main function, which must not return.
00186   rcall   main
00187 
00188 manage_io_cond:
00189   bld     r2, ISP_GPFB_IO_COND_EN_OFFSET
00190   brcc    start_program
00191   mov.w   r10, ISP_CFG_ADDRESS
00192   ld.w    r2, r10[0]
00193   mov     r3, ISP_CFG_CRC8_POLYNOMIAL
00194   mov     r4, r2
00195   rjmp    test_crc8_end
00196 crc8:
00197   clz     r5, r4
00198   rsub    r5, r5, 32 - 9
00199   lsl     r5, r3, r5
00200   eor     r4, r5
00201 test_crc8_end:
00202   cp.w    r4, 0xFF
00203   brhi    crc8
00204   cp.w    r4, 0
00205   brne    start_loader
00206   bfextu  r3, r2, ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_OFFSET, ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_SIZE
00207   cp.w    r3, ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_VALUE
00208   brne    start_loader
00209   bfextu  r3, r2, ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN_OFFSET, ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN_SIZE
00210   cp.w    r3, AVR32_GPIO_NUMBER_OF_PINS
00211   brhs    start_loader
00212   mov     r10, AVR32_GPIO_ADDRESS
00213   lsr     r4, r3, 5
00214   lsl     r4, 8
00215   add     r10, r4
00216   ld.w    r4, r10[AVR32_GPIO_PVR0]
00217   andl    r3, 0x1F
00218   lsr     r4, r4, r3
00219   bfextu  r3, r2, ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL_OFFSET, ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL_SIZE
00220   eor     r4, r3
00221   bld     r4, 0
00222   brcc    start_loader
00223 
00224 start_program:
00225   cp.w    r0, r1
00226   brne    start_program_no_isp_key
00227   rcall   disable_wdt
00228   .global boot_program
00229   .type boot_program, @function
00230 boot_program:
00231   mov     r8, ISP_KEY_ADDRESS
00232   mov     r0, 0
00233   st.w    r8[0], r0
00234 start_program_no_isp_key:
00235   mov.w   r0, AVR32_SR_GM_MASK | AVR32_SR_EM_MASK | AVR32_SR_M0_MASK
00236   mtsr    AVR32_SR, r0
00237   .irp    rd, r0, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, r7, r8, r9, r10, r11, r12, sp, lr
00238     mov     \rd, 0
00239   .endr
00240   mtsr    AVR32_EVBA, r0
00241   mtsr    AVR32_COUNT, r0
00242   lddpc   pc, program_start_address
00243 
00244 disable_wdt:
00245   mov.w   r2, AVR32_WDT_KEY_VALUE << AVR32_WDT_CTRL_KEY_OFFSET
00246   st.w    r9[AVR32_WDT_CTRL], r2
00247   eor.w   r2, AVR32_WDT_CTRL_KEY_MASK
00248   st.w    r9[AVR32_WDT_CTRL], r2
00249   mov     pc, lr
00250 
00251 
00252 // Constant data area.
00253 
00254   .balign 4
00255 
00256 program_start_address:
00257   .word PROGRAM_START_ADDRESS
